fileDescription: Strings for the Epic Games for WebView2 plugin.

epicgames_ext.name: Epic Games (WebView2)
epicgames_ext.description: Access Epic Games features in the WebView2 export option.

product-name.name: Product name
product-name.desc: The product name to use for Epic Games. Leave empty to use project name.

product-version.name: Product version
product-version.desc: The product version to use for Epic Games. Leave empty to use project version.

sdk-settings.name: SDK settings
sdk-settings.desc: Settings relating to the configuration of the Epic Games SDK.

product-id.name: Product ID
product-id.desc: The product ID from the Developer Portal.

client-id.name: Client ID
client-id.desc: The client ID from the Developer Portal.

client-secret.name: Client secret
client-secret.desc: The client secret from the Developer Portal.

sandbox-id.name: Sandbox ID
sandbox-id.desc: The sandbox ID from the Developer Portal.

deployment-id.name: Deployment ID
deployment-id.desc: The deployment ID from the Developer Portal.

auth-scope.name: Authentication scope
auth-scope.desc: The authentication scope flags to request on login. Must match application permissions.

scope-basic-profile.name: Basic profile
scope-basic-profile.desc: Request basic profile scope. (Must match application permissions.)

scope-friends-list.name: Friends list
scope-friends-list.desc: Request friends list scope. (Must match application permissions.)

scope-presence.name: Presence
scope-presence.desc: Request presence scope. (Must match application permissions.)

scope-country.name: Country
scope-country.desc: Request country scope. (Must match application permissions.)

is-available.description: True if successfully initialized the Epic Games API.

is-epic-launcher.description: True when started by the Epic Games launcher.

on-login-failed.description: Triggered after a login attempt fails.

on-logout-failed.description: Triggered after a logout attempt fails.

compare-login-type.description: Test which type of login is in use.

login-type.name: Login type
login-type.desc: The login type to check if in use.

on-login-status-changed.description: Triggered when the current user's login status changes.

on-any-achievement-unlock-success.description: Triggered after any successful 'Unlock achievement' action.

on-achievement-unlock-success.description: Triggered after a successful 'Unlock achievement' action.

on-any-achievement-unlock-error.description: Triggered after any 'Unlock achievement' action fails.

on-achievement-unlock-error.description: Triggered after an 'Unlock achievement' action failed.

log-in-portal.description: Log in using the built-in user onboarding experience provided by the Epic Games SDK.

log-in-persistent.description: Attempt to automatically log in by using a persisted previous login.

log-in-exchange-code.description: Log in using an exchange code. Allows automatic login with the launcher exchange code.

exchange-code.name: Exchange code
exchange-code.desc: The exchange code to use for login.

log-in-devauthtool.description: Log in using DevAuthTool provided in the Epic Games SDK for development/testing purposes.

host.name: Host
host.desc: The host that DevAuthTool is running on, e.g. "localhost:6547".

credential-name.name: Credential name
credential-name.desc: The name of one of the credentials added in DevAuthTool.

log-out.description: Log out of the user's currently logged in account.

unlock-achievement.description: Unlock an achievement for the current game.

login-status.description: The current login status as a string.

launcher-exchange-code.description: Exchange code allowing for automatic login with Epic Games launcher.

epic-account-id-str.description: The current user's Epic account ID as a string.

display-name.description: The current user's display name (if available).

display-name-sanitized.description: The current user's sanitized display name (if available).

preferred-language.description: The current user's preferred language as an ISO 639 language code (if available).

achievement.description: In an achievement trigger, the achievement ID.
